resources.string: Night mode is off, your phone will not automatically mute at night.

When you plug in your phone after 10pm and before 6am we will automatically mute your phone. 

Your phone will be unmuted when you unplug it. 

If you plug in your phone before 10pm, it will start muting at 10pm. 

You will still be able to hear your alarms.
Ringer was muted by Night Mode
Ringer was restored by Night Mode
Check out Night Mode! It automatically mutes your phone at night! https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.osacky.nightmode
How do you want to share Night Mode?
